name: Michael Stephanski
text: So greasy and salty!! They must be using cheap cheese. The quality has been progressively less each of the last 3 times we ate there. So sad since it's a great concept.

name: Robert Draper
text: They have a damn good personal pizza deal. Very fairly priced. We ordered here for the Gluten Free options for my wife. She was very happy with hers, but mine was far superior. Especially with that spicy tomato sauce they offer. Might order another few pies tonight.

name: Ilona Craig
text:
Outstandingly good, thin crust

Great service will go back for more very soon.

name: GGNINER
text: Went on a Saturday night, 9/5/2020 around 7ish. I must admit they're not the most friendly welcoming people but the pizza was pretty good. I'll go back but at another location

name: Cody Cox
text: Pizza was good. A bit pricey. Custom juice flavors were awesome. Seating was metal and uncomfortable so took off a star.

name: Michael trenton
text: Worst pizza I've ever had. 7-11 makes a better pizza. I have no idea how these people have a buisness. Overpriced poor quality Nasty. Had one slice and threw it in the trash. Delivery guy tossed it on my doorstep like a newspaper. Had a chair sitting right next to the door and left instructions for it to be placed there.what a joke..

name: Shannan Muire

text: I live their pizza. Down side is limited types of pizza. But I don't like pepperoni. So when I asked to change it for something else, they had no problem with it. It also didn't cost me anything extra. Staff is always friendly and always willing to communicate.

name: John Reynolds
text: Love this place... They need to drop the mask BS.

text: We love Blaze!  Choose your own toppings and have a quick-fired, fresh-made puzza for one or two.  They have started adding more healthy options like gluten free crust and cauliflower crust. Of course, you will pay more for the healthier options. Great place to eat though!

text: Always great pizza, have never had 1 issue with my pie. Employees are very friendly and attentive. All around a great visit. Again. üòÄ

text: Good pizza. I love the fact that a BYO includes all the toppings so if you want everything you can get everything and not pay an arm and a leg for "additional toppings". I also love the blood orange lemonade. Great atmosphere too.

text: Amazing and it has vegan options! My first time there. The staff were pleasant and helpful. The pizza is delicious. I'm definitely going back!

text: I honestly don't understand what the big deal is about this place. The pizza was mediocre at best.  The pizza  Did come out at a pretty quick pace. Other than that, wasn't overly impressed.

name: Nathan Petitpas
text: You can‚Äôt go wrong with an 8 dollar build your own pizza. I like blaze at least 2x as much as pie-o. Pro tip: if you stack everything you can on your pizza, get the high rise crust. They have this salted chocolate cookie that‚Äôs to die for ‚Ä¶More

text: place can get pretty packed so I recommended ordering online and picking up. get creative with your pizzas. you'll never hate what you got cause you most likely made it. pinch of oregeno always completes my pizza.

text:
This pizza is so good
You can select one on the menu or create your own. I always get the vegan cheese and it's absolutely amazing! I am not even a pizza person but I eat here frequently. They delicious salad too if you prefer something healthier!

text: I ordered 4 pizzas, three were good. The fourth pizza was burned badly on the bottom. Fairly short wait time. Pizza tasted good.
